## isEmptyObj() function

判断是否是空对象

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isEmptyObj(v: any, nullable?: boolean): v is {};
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  v | any | 需要判断的值 |
|  nullable | boolean | _(Optional)_ 是否允许空值 |

**Returns:**

v is {}

## Example


```ts
isEmptyObj({})// true
isEmptyObj(null)// false
isEmptyObj(null, false)// true
```
